job.title: Entry Level Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtTitle Entry Level Software EngineerltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtJob Description ltpgtltpgtGeekampnbspNerdampnbspLearn a programming language before you learned a foreign language You are in good company and wed like to talk to youampnbspCome geek out with us and make a difference while you learnampnbspWe have a scrappy startup feel with large company benefits and securityltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtOur Ideal CandidateltstronggtltpgtltpgtWe are looking for a passionate and tech knowledge hungry entry level software engineer that can grow with usampnbspThe ideal candidate will have early career programming skills and be proficient in one or more of the following languages C C Java Maybe some ASPNET javascripthtmlcss sprinkled inampnbspThe individual participates in all phases of the software development and delivery process ltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtWe are looking for entry level C Web developers with the following qualificationsltstronggt ltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtEntry Level Software Engineer ResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtLearn the technologies languages and practices used by the teamltligtltligtDevelop SaaS solutions in NET C SQL Angular and various API librariesltligtltligtParticipate in Scrum activitiesltligtltligtParticipate in code reviewsltligtltligtWork as part of the Scrum team or with the ability to act independently as neededltligtltligtCollaborate and communicate effectively with team members and other departments within the companyltligtltligtEnsure assigned technical tasks are being delivered on time and with qualityltligtltligtProvide production support and debugging for our production applicationsltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtEntry Level Software Engineer QualificationsltstronggtltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspCollege degree Associates or BachelorsltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspDemonstratable history of curiosity and innovation ltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspStrong desire to learn to code  No prior professional experience requiredltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspA natural problem solverltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspStrong communication and interpersonal skillsltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspMust be authorized to work in the US US Citizen or Green Card holderltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspAgile development of SaaS solutions Preferredltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgt ltstronggtAbout usltstronggtltpgtltpgtGSM is on a mission to make the workplace and the environment safer by simplifying compliance and chemical product documentationltpgtltpgtWith roots as a regulatory professional services provider for the chemical industry GSM developed a transformational approach to SDS authoring that focused on a limited universe of chemical hazards rather than chemical ingredients avoiding the need to review a potentially infinite number of ingredient combinations Our team consists of regulatory compliance experts that are ready to support you and your unique needsltpgtltpgtltstronggtCompensation and BenefitsltstronggtltpgtltpgtCompetitive salaries and excellent benefits are provided after a minimum waiting period Some of our benefits include 401k vacation paid holidays comprehensive health and dental plan company paid short ampamp long term disability and life insurance Join our team in Tampa FL for a rewarding career ltpgtltpgtltemgtGlobal Safety Management is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to diversity and values the ways in which we are different All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin disability veteran status or other characteristic protected by applicable lawltemgtltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
